summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the permit granted to Mobil Oil Corp. for pipelines in, under, along and across Thirteenth Avenue Southwest and Southwest Florida Street by Ordinance 102655 by amending Section 1 thereof to re-define the centerline and width of the pipeline corridor, and repealing Section 10 thereof and adding new Section 10 for computing the annual fee to conform with current procedures for determining fees for major and long term street encroachments and amending Section 12 thereof to increase the amount of the Surety Bond.
